entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kelowna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 a.m. PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 12.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 11:00 PM PDT Friday 5 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 12.9°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 11.8°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers or thunderstorms. Low 10.
entry.summary: Showers. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 mm. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level lowering to 1700 metres before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 5 May 2023
